Whenever you discard a card, put a blast counter on Depth Charge.
{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{T}, Exile Depth Charge: Exile each nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the number of blast counters on Depth Charge.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.

When Ihosk, Lord of Blackwater enters the battlefield, double the amount of {E} you have.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay an amount of {E} equal to that creature’s mana value. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it.
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, copy it for each nontoken artifact you control.

As Formless Behemoth enters the battlefield, if it was cast, you may search your library for exactly two creature cards with different names and exile them. If you do, target opponent chooses one of those cards. Formless Behemoth enters the battlefield as a copy of the chosen card with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the other card.

When Retrieval Unit enters the battlefield, choose target opponent. If that player controls more creatures than you, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. The same is true for artifacts and for enchantments.

Beyond [i](This creature can’t be blocked except by three or more creature or by creatures with beyond.)[/i]

You may pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E} rather than pay the mana cost for spells you cast.

{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. Activate only once each turn.
{B}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card. Activate only once each turn.
{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. Activate only once each turn.

Volatile Vent deals 4 damage to any nonplayer target. If that permanent’s controller controls more lands than you, Volatile Vent deals an amount of additional damage equal to the difference to that player.
